p:
Rao et al. reported the synthesis of 2-arylaminobenzothiazole-arylpropeonones and studied their cytotoxic activities against different human cancer cell lines. Among all synthesised derivatives, substituted phenylamino based methoxybenzothiazole 68 ( Figure 41) and substituted phenylamino based methoxy methylbenzothiazole 69 ( Figure 41) showed potent cytotoxic activity against HeLa cell lines possessing IC 50 values of 0.5 ± 0.02 and 0.6 ± 0.29 µM
65 .
